listitem.para: The FlyMine Browse search allows you to quickly and directly access the data in FlyMine. Entering any object identifier (such as a gene name or identifier) will take you straight to the details page for that object. Wildcards are automatically attached to any text entered and so your search may match more than one object identifier in the database. In such a case a list of all matching objects is shown, from where you can access the object details pages.
